Description:
Detects file creation events with filename patterns used by CrackMapExec.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - CrackMapExec File Indicators
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (filepath like 'c:\windows\temp\%' and ((filepath like '%\temp.ps1' or filepath like '%\msol.ps1') or (filepath re '\\[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}\.txt$' and filepath re '\\[a-zA-Z]{8}\.tmp$')))
